description: This course builds on the concepts and components of DANCE 111 Modern Dance I and DANCE 210 Modern Dance II and DANCE 211 Modern Dance II. Offered each semester. Prerequisite: DANCE 210 or DANCE 211 for at least two terms with two different instructors or permission of the instructor.
name: Modern III
prerequisites: DANCE 210 or DANCE 211 for at least two terms with two different instructors or permission of the instructor.
